question: [File: consensus/src/quorum_store/batch_requester.rs] [Function: request_batch()] [Response withholding] Can Byzantine validators deliberately delay responses to right before rpc_timeout to maximize latency? (Medium)

[File: consensus/src/quorum_store/batch_requester.rs] [Function: request_batch()] [False expiration] Can Byzantine validators send NotFound with fake recent ledger info to incorrectly mark valid batches as expired? (Critical)

[File: consensus/src/quorum_store/batch_requester.rs] [Function: request_batch()] [Split brain] Can network partition cause some validators to receive batches while others receive NotFound, causing state divergence? (Critical)

[File: consensus/src/quorum_store/batch_requester.rs] [Function: request_batch()] [Selective serving] Can Byzantine validators selectively serve batches to some peers but not others to cause inconsistent state? (High)
